message.content:
cs.DC, cs.DB, cs.DS, cs.OS, cs.SE. 

The paper deals with managing updates in geo-replicated systems, which involves distributed computing and database systems. Therefore, cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) and cs.DB (Databases) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also proposes a novel approach to manage the tradeoff between throughput and latency, which involves data structures and algorithms, making cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) a likely sub-category as well. The implementation of the proposed approach as a variant of Riak KV involves operating systems, making cs.OS (Operating Systems) a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper deals with system consistency and performance, which are topics related to software engineering, making cs.SE (Software Engineering) a possible sub-category.
